Description.Text:
Property Location
Residhome Nice Promenade is centrally located in Nice, walking distance from Nice Museum of Fine Arts and close to Orthodox Cathedral. This family-friendly residence is within close proximity of Foundation Lenval Children's Hospital and Casino Ruhl.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 81 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and microwaves. Rooms have private balconies. 55-cm flat-screen televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided weekly.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a rooftop terrace and a terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access.

Dining
Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM
Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Nice Museum of Fine Arts - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Orthodox Cathedral - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Foundation Lenval Children's Hospital - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Casino Ruhl - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Promenade des Anglais - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Verdure Theatre - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Albert 1st Gardens - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Nice Etoile Shopping Center - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Basilique Notre Dame - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Place Massena - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Quai des Etats Unis - 1.5 km / 1 mi
Nice Opera - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Courthouse Square - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Cours Saleya - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Nice Cathedral - 2 km / 1.2 mi

The nearest airports are:
Nice (NCE-Cote d'Azur) - 4.4 km / 2.7 mi
Monte Carlo (MCM-Monaco Heliport) - 13.8 km / 8.6 mi

The preferred airport for Residhome Nice Promenade is Nice (NCE-Cote d'Azur).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Citadines Apart'hotel Nice Promenade is Nice (NCE-Cote d'Azur) - 4.4 km / 2.7 mi.
